description: Silas considered using his fleet of blimps for marketing, but decided that selling them directly was all the marketing he needed.

name: Pandaren Kite
description: This token of honor is a gift from the Lorewalkers of Pandaria. Flying manual seemingly not included, however.

name: Jade Pandaren Kite
description: The residents of Pandaria salute your enthusiasm for wildlife preservation. They do have concerns about housing 150 animals per visit, though.

name: Pandaren Kite
description: This "mount," awarded by the Lorewalkers of Pandaria, is a reward to the hero of their organization.

name: Blue Marsh Hopper
description: That squishing sound every time it takes a step? That's a feature.

name: Yellow Marsh Hopper
description: No one makes giant, slimy spawns like Krag'wa the Huge.

name: Green Marsh Hopper
description: Gottum collects spawns of Krag'wa from all around the Frogmarsh, but only the most bulbous are used as mounts.

name: Cerulean Marsh Hopper
description: Gottum's expansion into export markets was inevitable with news of the Trading Post reaching even into the depths of the Frogmarsh.

name: Swift Spectral Rylak
description: Even the dead need a lift every now and then.

name: Soaring Skyterror
description: The extra-light equipment on this chromatic rylak allows it to swoop and glide through the clouds easily, free from the bounds of the land below.

name: Acherus Deathcharger
description: Some horses merely adopt the dark. This horse was born in it, molded by it.

name: Crimson Deathcharger
description: Stabled in the Icecrown Citadel to serve the Lich King's most favored minions.

name: Blackpaw
description: Blackpaw was just hibernating, minding his own business, and then suddenly there was a warfront.

name: Glacial Tidestorm
description: Though she commands a variety of magical powers, Jaina has always been most proficient at summoning powerful elementals of water and ice.

name: Magic Rooster
description: Magic in the hands of a genius can do wonderful, miraculous things. Magic in the hands of an idiot can make a giant rooster.

name: Magic Rooster
description: Magic in the hands of a genius can do wonderful, miraculous things. Magic in the hands of an idiot can make a giant rooster.

name: Magic Rooster
description: Magic in the hands of a genius can do wonderful, miraculous things. Magic in the hands of an idiot can make a giant rooster.

name: Felsteed
description: Corrupted by demonic power and once forced to serve the Shadow Council.

name: Warhorse
description: Trained to stand firm in righteous combat.

name: Exarch's Elekk
description: Draenei exarchs have long marched into war atop these imposing mounts, bred for their razor-sharp tusks.

name: Thalassian Warhorse
description: A loyal companion to any who would protect Silvermoon.

name: Farseer's Raging Tempest
description: Windfury. Overload: (2).

name: Tarecgosa's Visage
description: "Farewell, Tarecgosa. A dear sister, hero, student, and teacher. Though blood does not bind us, you will always be family. May your soul find its place soaring among the stars."

name: Ultramarine Qiraji Battle Tank
description: The Tol'vir sorcerer Azj'Aqir was said to possess a scepter that would allow him to control a Qiraj battle tank outside of its Silithus home.

name: Gleaming Moonbeast
description: Armored in glistening silver, these devoted mounts are said to be a blessing from Elune herself.

name: Imagiwing
description: There's nothing more beautiful than watching your imagination take flight.

name: Springtide Dreamtalon
description: Surging with the kind of energy and enthusiasm that can make anyone envious.

name: Blossoming Dreamstag
description: The pelts of young dreamstags flower with the vibrant colors of the dream.

name: Suntouched Dreamstag
description: The sun's radiant energy nurtures these dreamstags, helping them rapidly reach maturity.

name: Mammyth
description: In the Dream, sometimes the myth is more real than its basis.

name: Ochre Dreamtalon
description: Playful dreamtalons often decorate themselves in a myriad of colors that only autumn offers.

name: Snowfluff Dreamtalon
description: As lighthearted and gentle as the snow, they can bounce from one snowdrift to the next without leaving a print.

name: Verdant Armoredon
description: The gnarled horns of this armoredon are far stronger than bone.

name: Delugen
description: Imagine being so engrossed by a dream that it feels real; some might even call it a delusion.

name: Talont
description: Some daydreams are filled with wondrous possibilities, but shatter when reminded of reality's limitations. Some dreams are not so burdened, even when they carry a rider.

name: Stargrazer
description: One can't help but think what it might feel like to pluck the stars from their fixture in the sky. Perhaps, Stargrazer will show us how someday.

name: Jeweled Copper Scarab
description: The rulers of desert kingdoms would attune crystals to their personal mounts for quick summoning.

name: Golden Regal Scarab
description: Plated with gold and socketed with emeralds, this scarab is fit to fly royalty in style.

name: Algarian Stormrider
description: Bred to fly true in the harshest conditions, this lighting-infused gryphon was trained in the thane's rookery to soar through the skies of Khaz Algar and into the depths below.

name: Runebound Firelord
description: By fire be purged the obstacles in your path!

name: Crimson Glimmerfur
description: Gilnean legend states this red-and-white fox only crosses the Winter Veil during one season.

name: Rekindled Dreamstag
description: Ashes of fallen leaves are fertile soil for dreamstags to arise from.

name: Lunar Dreamstag
description: The moon's pale light is reflected in the pelt of these elusive nocturnal creatures.

name: Vicious Moonbeast
description: Unlike most of its kind, this moonbeast has a taste for Horde blood and an affinity for the color blue.

name: Vicious Moonbeast
description: Unlike most of its kind, this moonbeast has a taste for Alliance blood and an affinity for the color red.

name: Salatrancer
description: While most salamanthers' attention jumps freely from one attraction to the next, this one enjoys long periods of deep observation.

name: Verdant Gladiator's Slitherdrake
description: This drake visited many heroes in their dreams before joining your cause.

name: Flourishing Whimsydrake
description: These playful protectors of the Emerald Dream may be larger than their faerie dragon relatives, but they are no less mischievous.

name: Evening Sun Dreamsaber
description: These dreamsabers are ferocious in battle, yet lethargic and often found lazily outstretched upon open fields. After soaking in the warmth of daylight, their flame flares that much brighter.

name: Morning Flourish Dreamsaber
description: Known for the lavish energy that emanates from them, these sabers are notorious tricksters. Their roar scatters the early birds that wake them.

name: Anu'relos, Flame's Guidance
description: Though her feathers flicker with flame's destructive potential, they do not scorch, but simply radiate a comfortable heat.

name: Shadow Dusk Dreamsaber
description: A dreamsaber strikes quickly from the shadows, capturing small animals and slipping back into darkness without a sound. The lucky few who have seen a feeding dreamsaber can see them revel in lazily toying with their prey before beginning their meal.

name: Winter Night Dreamsaber
description: These nocturnal dreamsabers carry the chill of winter with them and will often hibernate for days on end if not otherwise awoken.
